attributes.action: Stop the banning of RT in the UK
attributes.background: Following the assassination attempt in Salisbury, the government is proposing that the News channel RT should be banned from the UK airwaves. If we value the concept of free speech at all then this should be out of the question. Please sign to stop this blatant attempt at political censorship.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Ofcom, not the UK Government or Parliament.
